resources.string: Failed to log in. Check your password and configuration settings.
Unable to message: invalid encryption scheme
Unable to message: unknown encryption protocol
Unable to message: wrong private key

This message contains all information to transfer your Autocrypt
settings along with your secret key securely to another device.

To set up your new device for Autocrypt, please follow the
instructions that should be presented by your new device.

This is the Autocrypt setup file used to transfer settings and keys between clients. You can decrypt it using the Setup Code presented on your old device, and then import the contained key into your keyring.
Please write down the following passphrase: \n%s\nThis will be used to transfer encrypted messages from your current device to other Autocrypt devices.
Looks like a mail application has setup encryption for this e-mail account. Enter the Autocrypt passphrase below to access encrypted messages.
